title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running, double running, fern, eyelet, montenegrin, cross, marking cross, four-sided cross, stem, Roumanian, satin, detached chain, herringbone, and detached looping on plain weave foundation
description: Multicolor bands of pattern including raised naked figures picking acorns followed by alphabet facing in other direction and signature and date.
name: Sampler
